translations: n.[船]甲板（deck 的复数）；平台；舱板
v.装饰；把……铺作甲板（deck 的三单形式）

phrs.translation: 在甲板上；准备就绪的；下一个将轮到的
n. 录放音座（等于deck）；磁带放送机（等于tape player）
舱面建筑；甲板结构；上承结构；舱面结构
甲板；上甲板；坞墙顶甲板
折叠式躺椅；折叠帆布躺椅

sentences.sentence: Our customers may not be building cabinets or outdoor decks; we try to do that for them.
sentences.translation: 我们的客户可能不会建造橱柜或室外甲板；而我们在尝试为他们做这些事情。

sentences.sentence: The ships had nine decks, and White Star Line decided to focus on making them the most luxurious ships on the water.
sentences.translation: 这些船有九层甲板，白星航运公司决定致力于将其打造成水上最豪华的船只。

sentences.sentence: An ice storm had turned the decks into frozen sheets that sent hundreds of families sliding into the sea as the ship tilted and began to go down.
sentences.translation: 一场暴风雪把甲板变成了冰封的薄板，当船倾斜并开始下沉时，数百个家庭滑入大海。
